meanings.definition: A small marine fish with a head resembling that of a horse.
meanings.sent1: Seahorses swim gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw colorful seahorses at the aquarium.
meanings.sent3: The seahorses had a race to see who was the fastest swimmer.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of seahorses in a tank was like a tiny underwater parade.
meanings.sent5: The seahorses' unique appearance makes them fascinating creatures to observe.

meanings.definition: A mythical sea creature with the head and forelimbs of a horse and the tail of a fish.
meanings.sent1: Legends tell of majestic seahorses roaming the depths of the sea.
meanings.sent2: The sailors feared encountering the mythical seahorses on their voyage.
meanings.sent3: The seahorses in the story were known for their mischievous pranks.
meanings.sent4: The seahorses' presence in the tale added a touch of magic to the narrative.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the seahorses sparkled like stars in the dark ocean.
